rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0001
rows.name: I am but a humble bard.

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I haven't a chance of
leaving Luxuria...

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0003
rows.name:
In fact, my only talent is to
sing the ballads my master taught
me, and that gets me pittance.

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0004
rows.name:
The ballad of Adel is particularly
popular around here.

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0005
rows.name:
In fact, I've sung it so many
times, I can hardly remember the
words to the rest of the songs...
